name: YC118 Succession Trial Champion's Decree - House Kor-Azor
description:
Issued by Lord Aritcio Kor-Azor, this decree was broadcast across the empire, and bears the seal of the Kor-Azor family. The text reads:

“By ancient trial of fire and blood in the YC118 Amarr Championships I, Lord Aritcio Kor-Azor, Heir of House Kor-Azor, do affirm the selection of capsuleer pilot call signed “Lysus” as my champion and representative during the YC118 Imperial Succession Trials.

This decree grants my champion Lordship within the Kor-Azor Family, along with title and estate as Holder on Eclipticum, in the Imperial system of Kor-Azor Prime.”
